validated_companies.name: Primechain Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
validated_companies.funding_info: Primechain Technologies has not raised any funding rounds yet.
validated_companies.validation_notes: Primechain Technologies is based in Pune, Maharashtra, India, and was founded in 2016 by Shinam Arora. It is classified as a startup since it is less than 10 years old and is not a large enterprise. The company is currently active with no reported funding rounds.

validated_companies.name: Antier Solutions
validated_companies.funding_info: Details about funding rounds are not provided, but they are recognized as a significant player in blockchain solutions.
validated_companies.validation_notes: Antier Solutions is based in Mohali, Punjab, India, and was founded by Vikram R Singh in 2011. However, it is considered not a startup as it was founded over 10 years ago and has grown into a well-established corporation.

summary: Validation completed for 2 companies in the Blockchain sector. Found 1 valid Indian startups. 1 companies failed validation.
